explanation: [0-0] A man in a red shirt and a red cap, holding a paper bag in both hands, is standing inside a McDonald's fast food window. A man in black clothes is standing outside, extending his right hand forward. Inside, there is also a person with yellow hair. The wall outside is made of brown wood, with two pieces of white paper stuck on it. On the upper paper, an "M" symbol is drawn, and below the symbol, in a red rectangular box, there are white subtitles that read "McDonald's". The lower paper depicts various burger graphics.

[0-4] The man in red talks and hands the paper bag to the man in black outside. The man in black takes the bag with both hands and talks, while a man in white clothes makes a phone call behind him. Subsequently, the man in red extends his right index finger and walks to the left while talking.

[4-12] Then, the scene switches to the man in red pushing open a black door and walking in, holding a red object in his left hand. Afterwards, a person in gray clothes and wearing gray and yellow gloves is seen standing by the stove, holding a black pot in his right hand. Then, the man in red walks to the stove with a clip holding food in his right hand, pointing his left index finger at the red object. Immediately after, an iron rod is seen stirring the silver liquid in the pot. The person in gray holds the black pot with tongs in both hands and pours the silver liquid onto the food.
